# rtx_bgp (Resource)

Manages BGP (Border Gateway Protocol) configuration on RTX routers. BGP is a singleton resource - only one BGP configuration can exist per router.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `asn` (String) Autonomous System Number (1-4294967295). Supports 4-byte ASN.

### Optional

- `default_ipv4_unicast` (Boolean) Enable IPv4 unicast address family by default for new neighbors.
- `log_neighbor_changes` (Boolean) Log neighbor up/down changes.
- `neighbor` (Block List) BGP neighbor configurations. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--neighbor))
- `network` (Block List) Networks to announce via BGP. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--network))
- `redistribute_connected` (Boolean) Redistribute connected routes into BGP.
- `redistribute_static` (Boolean) Redistribute static routes into BGP.
- `router_id` (String) BGP router ID in IPv4 address format. If not set, uses the highest loopback or interface IP.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--neighbor"></a>
### Nested Schema for `neighbor`

Required:

- `id` (Number) Neighbor ID (1-based index for RTX router).
- `ip` (String) Neighbor IP address.
- `remote_as` (String) Remote AS number (1-4294967295).

Optional:

- `hold_time` (Number) Hold time in seconds (3-65535). Default is 90.
- `keepalive` (Number) Keepalive interval in seconds (1-21845). Default is 30.
- `local_address` (String) Local IP address for the BGP session.
- `multihop` (Number) eBGP multihop TTL (1-255). Required for non-directly connected eBGP peers.
- `password` (String, Sensitive) MD5 authentication password for the BGP session.


<a id="nestedblock--network"></a>
### Nested Schema for `network`

Required:

- `mask` (String) Network mask in dotted decimal notation.
- `prefix` (String) Network prefix to announce.
